author: fradamt
content: No, when the attestation is to the beacon block that was just proposed, the index should be set to 0 since there is no payload information, and having a single value makes aggregation better (though in principle we could also not enforce this on chain and just enforce it in the fork choice and p2p)

author: fradamt
content: Or not enforce it all and just have the honest behavior be attest with 0

content: but shouldn't the same attestation vote on the EMPTY vs FULL of the payload of the prev block?
